Alternate Title: Five questions to men who have not enlisted
Contributor: David Allen & Sons, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: "Poster No. 57" appears on the bottom left of the poster. "6 M-1/15" appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to enlist to-day because your King and country need you. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 57.
